description:
Sign up and log in users with their Strava credentials and retrieve athletes' route & activity data.

Contact rideon@everyvelo.com for support.
name: Strava v2
plugin_instructions:
1. Register your application at https://www.strava.com/settings/api

2. Once registered, you'll be given a Client ID (App ID) and a Client Secret (App Secret), which you will enter into the plugin settings.

3. Make sure to add an Authorization Callback Domain. This would either be https://[your-app-name].bubbleapps.io or your custom domain.
